text: Lucie Barma is a Canadian freestyle skier. She won a bronze medal in ski ballet at the FIS Freestyle World Ski Championships 1986 in Tignes, and another bronze medal in ski ballet at the FIS Freestyle World Ski Championships 1989 in Oberjoch. She took part in the 1988 Winter Olympics in Calgary, where ski ballet was a demonstration event. == References == == External links == * Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Canadian female freestyle skiers
title: Lucie Barma
